headline: Extend your hand — bring joy to a heart
description: “From Heart to Heart” is a charitable project providing support and compassion to children.
aboutus: “From Heart to Heart” is a bridge of humanity, compassion, and hope. As a foundation, we strive to strengthen kindness in society by helping children in difficult conditions, single mothers, elderly people, and families in need. Every person deserves attention. Every heart needs care. We believe that together, we can make big changes with small actions. That’s why our mission is not only material support — we bring joy, hope, and trust. Our foundation grows thanks to volunteers, donors, and kind people. Bringing warmth to someone’s life is the greatest gift. Every donation and every moment is part of the journey from one heart to another. Join us — be among the hearts that lead to kindness. Because kindness begins in the heart.
aboutspan: True change begins in the heart.
